tool_description: Enhances experience descriptions by replacing weak language with strong action verbs and impactful phrasing to create more compelling resume content.

industry_context.description: Industry context: technology, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, retail, consulting, or general

optimization_level.description: Level of optimization: subtle, moderate, or strong

error_messages: Empty experience text: Provide experience descriptions to optimize.
Invalid industry context: Use one of [technology, healthcare, finance, education, manufacturing, retail, consulting, general].
Invalid optimization level: Use one of [subtle, moderate, strong].
Text too short: Provide sufficient experience content for meaningful optimization.
usage: Input experience descriptions and optionally specify industry context and optimization level. The tool returns enhanced descriptions with stronger action verbs.

optimized_text.description: Enhanced experience descriptions with strong action verbs

verbs_replaced.description: List of weak verbs that were replaced

new_action_verbs.description: Strong action verbs used in optimization
